name: Happy Duckday
description:
From Linnet, to Puddle.

It was a special day for the little duck! He was excited to go explore the world beyond his pond, but it was too cold, and he ended up getting stuck in the snow! How would he get out of this? Would his special day come to an end? Or would a strange human come save him...

˜˜˜

Happy Duckday is a very short visual novel made in under a month for my best friend's birthday. Happy birthday Saturn!

This game is about 10 minutes long.

Art, writing, coding and music by me! Links to the fonts used can be found in the game's about page!

NOTE: Puddle's pronouns are it/its /he/him. Linnet's pronouns are they/them.
